intro: Photographer/Filmy guy who likes editing also.

post.body: Pretty much last day of a video project been doing for half of the year perfect timing for it to end in December.
Day has been good. Got to make some Veg chill for dinner smells great
The Titan V Nvidia looks interesting if allows some development into AI tech
Somedays I wish news could be nice, but then again people find peace & love a hard concept to accept
One of things I've been trying to do is cooking dinner in the morning, makes it such less stress after the day at night.
One favourite thing over the holiday period I like is brandy eggnog can't get enough of it.
One thing I have learned from the audio industry is audio engineers (some of them) are pretty snobby when it come to what they call cheap microphones (200 dollar mics) they haven't tried

comment.body: @Esmein: You know a decentralised Flickr comes to idea

@Esmein: I don't overly remember which codecs are not legacy but I'm guessing its Jpeg. Well also today's standard compression is good enough to make photos really small unbelievably. But yes it's a great idea only thing is I'm terrible at coding, XD
